Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We need to analyze the event log. Lets first list each case and see what activities repeat within that case. Case C001: Verify Documents appears twice. Case C002: Call Customer appears twice. Case C003: Verify Documents appears twice. So the repeating activities are Verify Documents and Call Customer.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For Verify Documents first occurrence is initial check second is re-check after additional docs or after adjustment. For Call Customer in C002 first is to clarify discrepancy second is follow-up to confirm adjustments.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Rename only the repeating occurrences within each case to reflect context like Initial Document Verification and Re-verify Documents for Verify Documents.

Name: Backtracking - NE
Text: Debate whether to rename only duplicates or all occurrences for consistency across cases. Consider keeping originals for singles but worry about mixed naming. Consider renaming all Verify Documents and Call Customer instances.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Best approach is to rename all occurrences of Verify Documents and Call Customer to reflect specific contexts using additional context and sequence ensuring disambiguation within and across cases.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Propose names: Initial Document Verification for first checks, Re-verify Documents Additional Docs for C001 second, Physical Document Verification for C003 first, Re-verify Documents After Adjustment for C003 second. For calls: Call Customer Request Missing Docs, Clarify Discrepancy, Confirm Adjustments, Recall Customer.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Names reflect contextual differences from additional context timestamps resources and position. Ensures clear process flow and disambiguates repeats.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Use base name plus qualifier in parentheses for consistency like Call Customer Clarify Discrepancy. Produce revised table in markdown format and brief justifications.
